name: ATP aptamer
description: ATP (Adenosine 5'-triphosphate) is an important substance for energy storage and metabolism in the body, which provides energy for metabolism and plays a role as a coenzyme in cells. ATP is an important endogenous signal molecule in immunity and inflammation.

name: B4-25 aptamer
description: Reactive Blue 4 is an anthraquinone dye, as a single colorimetric chemosensor for sequential determination of multiple analytes with different optical responses in aqueous media. Reactive Blue 4 is phytotoxic, cytotoxic and genotoxic.

name: CB-42 aptamer
description: Cibacron Blue 3G-A is an anthraquinone dye, inhibits the R46 β-lactamase with a Ki value of 1.2 uM.

name: Pepper aptamer
description: HBC ((4-((2-hydroxyethyl)(methyl)amino)-benzylidene)-cyanophenyl-acetonitrile) is a synthetic dye similar to GFP fluorophores, featuring a structurally rigid electron acceptor and a strong electron donor.

name: FMN aptamer
description: Flavin mononucleotide (FMN) is a cofactor that mediates oxidation–reduction reactions when bound as a prosthetic group in flavoproteins.The chromophore (isoalloxazine ring) of FMN serves as a transient carrier of a pair of hydrogen atoms removed from the substrate molecule in redox reactions catalyzed by these enzymes.
